left_join.name: principais
left_join.left_on: princ.id_empresa = prod.id_empresa and princ.id_filial = prod.id_filial and princ.codigo = prod.id_principal

inner_join.name: grupos
inner_join.inner_on: gru.id_empresa = imo.id_empresa and gru.id_filial = imo.id_filial and gru.codigo = imo.cod_grupo

inner_join.name: centroscustos
inner_join.inner_on: cc.id_empresa = imo.id_empresa and cc.id_filial = imo.id_filial and cc.codigo = imo.cod_cc

left_join.name: fornecedores
left_join.left_on: forne.id_empresa = imo.id_empresa and forne.id_filial = imo.id_filial and forne.id = imo.id_fornecedor

inner_join.name: imobilizados
inner_join.inner_on: imo.id_empresa = nf.id_empresa and imo.id_filial = nf.id_filial and imo.codigo = nf.id_imobilizado

inner_join.inner_on: imo.id_empresa = val.id_empresa and imo.id_filial = val.id_filial and imo.codigo = val.id_imobilizado
